price: 11. Mpe soki Allah atiyelaka bato mabe ezua bango na lombango ndenge balukaka bolamu na lombangu, nde suka ya bomoyi bwa bango esila kokoka. Mpe topesi elaka na baye bazali kolikya te na bokutani bwa biso. Bazali na koyimayima na kati ya kolekisa ndelo.
arabic: ۞ وَلَوۡ يُعَجِّلُ ٱللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ ٱلشَّرَّ ٱسۡتِعۡجَالَهُم بِٱلۡخَيۡرِ لَقُضِيَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَجَلُهُمۡۖ فَنَذَرُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walaw yuʿajjilu al-lahu lilnnāsi al-shara is'tiʿ'jālahum bil-khayri laquḍiya ilayhim ajaluhum fanadharu alladhīna lā yarjūna liqāanā fī ṭugh'yānihim yaʿmahūna
